src_original: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvastatkūṭāgāraṃ praviśya tadadhiṣṭhānamavasṛjya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā etadavocata - uttiṣṭha kulaputra /
tgt_original: 爾時彌勒即攝神力入樓閣中，彈指告言： 「善男子！ 起。

src_original: aviṣṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ kulaputra sarvadharmā bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhitāḥ /  evaṃ svabhāvāpariniṣpannā māyāsvapnapratibhāsopamāḥ /
tgt_original: 此是菩薩知諸法智，因緣聚集所現之相，如幻夢等。

src_original: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tenācchaṭāśabdena tataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ /  taṃ maitreyo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭā te kulaputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānavikurvāḥ?
śrutaṃ te bodhisattvaniryāṇamukham?  dṛṣṭā te buddhakṣetravyūhāpramāṇatā? dṛṣṭā (Gv 416)  te tathāgatapraṇidhivaiśāradyavaiśeṣikatā?
tgt_original: 「汝住菩薩不可思議自在解脫，此解脫門名入三世一切境界不忘念智莊嚴藏。

src_original: anugatā te bodhisattvavimokṣācintyatā?  anubhūtaṃ te bodhisattvasamādhiprītimukham?
tgt_original: 此門中有不可說解脫門，一生菩薩之所能得。 」善財問言： 「此莊嚴事何處去耶？

src_original: maitreya āha - sarvatryadhvārambaṇajñānapraveśāsaṃmoṣasmṛtivyūhagarbho nāma kulaputra eṣa vimokṣaḥ /  īdṛśānāṃ ca kulaputra vimokṣāṇāmanabhilāpyānabhilāpyānāmekajātipratibaddho bodhisattvo lābhī /  sudhana āha - kva asau ārya vyūho gataḥ?
tgt_original: 「從菩薩智慧神力中來，依菩薩智慧神力而住，無有去處亦無住處，非集非常，遠離一切。 」次明無來無去。
